title: Find horizontal asymptotes from limits at infinity

content.question: If a and b are positive constants, then <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow> </munder> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>a</mi><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow> <mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaeyOhIukapaqabaGcpeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiGacYgacaGGUbWaae Waa8aabaWdbiaadkgacaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGymaaGaayjkaiaawMca aaWdaeaapeGaciiBaiaac6gadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamyyaiaadIhapa WaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaiodaaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaaGaeyypa0daaa@4E43@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
